entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
